refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: pg_get_notify gets notify message sent by NOTIFY SQL command. To receive notify messages, LISTEN SQL command must be issued. If there is notify message on the connection, array contains message name and backend PID is returned. If there is no message, &false; is returned.

example.title: PostgreSQL NOTIFY message
example.programlisting:
<?php 
$conn = pg_pconnect("dbname=publisher");
if (!$conn) {
    echo "An error occured.\n";
    exit;
}

// Listen 'author_updated' message from other processes
pq_query($conn, 'LISTEN author_updated;');
$notify = pg_get_notify($conn);
if (!$notify)
    print("No messages\n");
else
    print_r($notify);
?>
